hero.title: Share information with tenants like you.
hero.body: We are a community-driven platform that aims to elevate tenant voices and promote landlord accountability.

icon.title: Help Keep Landlords Accountable
icon.anon-sub: Share your rental experience with confidence.
icon.sol-sub: Join fellow Tenants by creating an informed community.
icon.trans-sub: Empower others to make decisions about housing.

review-form.title: Landlord or Property Management Information
review-form.sub: Please make sure all this information matches your Lease
review-form.rate-title: Please rate the following on a scale from 1 (worst) to 5 (best)

footer.copy: Rate The Landlord. All Rights Reserved.

reviews.title: Find your landlord
reviews.body: Search our database to find information about your landlord. If you don't see a result, be the first to add a review!
